    • Field Detail

      • TRIES_AMOUNT

        public static final int TRIES_AMOUNT
        Tries amount for TCP and UDP to switch ports before they throw an (maybe fatal) Error.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TRIES_STEPS

        public static final int TRIES_STEPS
        Tries steps for TCP and UDP to switch ports. Means PORT + thisValue * TRIES_AMOUNT.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BROADCAST_INTERVAL

        public static final int BROADCAST_INTERVAL
        UDPOut broadcast interval.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RECONNECT_TOLERANCE

        public static final int RECONNECT_TOLERANCE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PORT

        public static javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty PORT

        Default port is 8888 for TCP and UDP. If TCP port is not available (as tcp client or server) it will try automatically other ports (TRIES_AMOUNT). If UDP port fails a NetworkManager.NETWORK_FATALERROR is thrown (can be thrown also if other errors occur).

      • status

        protected static javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<NetworkConfig.States> status

      • statusChangeTime

        protected static java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.util.Date> statusChangeTime
